member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.AsposeOcr
member.summary: Main API for Aspose OCR library

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.AsposeOcr.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Empty constructor.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.AsposeOcr.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Set the allowed characters with alphabet property.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.AsposeOcr.CalculateSkew(System.IO.MemoryStream)
member.summary: Calculates the skew angle of an image.

member.summary: Calculates the skew angle of an image.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.AsposeOcr.CalculateSkewFromUri(System.String)
member.summary: Calculates the skew angle of an image from URI.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.AsposeOcr.RecognizePdf(System.IO.MemoryStream,Aspose.OCR.DocumentRecognitionSettings)
member.summary:
Recognize text from scanned pdf (extract images).
Recognizes pdf file with the ability to specify . Supports Scanned PDF only. Doesn't supports Searchable PDF.
member.param: Memory stream with the pdf file.
member.returns: The object with image recognition results.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.AsposeOcr.RecognizePdf(System.String,Aspose.OCR.DocumentRecognitionSettings)
member.summary:
Recognize text from scanned pdf (extract images).
Recognizes pdf file with the ability to specify . Supports Scanned PDF only. Doesn't supports Searchable PDF.
member.returns: The object with image recognition results.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.AsposeOcr.RecognizeTiff(System.String,Aspose.OCR.DocumentRecognitionSettings)
member.summary:
Recognize text from multi-page TIFF image.
Recognizes TIFF file with the ability to specify . Supports TIFF (TIF) only. Doesn't supports other image types.
member.returns: The list of objects with image recognition results.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.AsposeOcr.RecognizeDjvu(System.String,Aspose.OCR.DocumentRecognitionSettings)
member.summary:
Recognize text from multi-page DJVU image.
Recognizes DJVU file with the ability to specify . Supports DJVU only. Doesn't supports other image types.
member.returns: The list of objects with image recognition results.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.AsposeOcr.PreprocessImage(System.String,Aspose.OCR.Models.PreprocessingFilters.PreprocessingFilter)
member.summary: Use image preprocessing to improve the accuracy of OCR. Create a list of filters that will be applied to the input image in the order you specify. example to create filters: PreprocessingFilter filters = new PreprocessingFilter { PreprocessingFilter.Invert(), PreprocessingFilter.Threshold(150), PreprocessingFilter.Binarize(), PreprocessingFilter.Rotate(180), PreprocessingFilter.Resize(3000,3000, Aspose.OCR.Filters.InterpolationFilterType.Box), PreprocessingFilter.Scale(6f), PreprocessingFilter.Dilate() }; You don't need all of them. Set only what you need.
member.returns: Stream with modified image so you can save or recognize it.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.AsposeOcr.RecognizeImageFast(System.String)
member.summary: Recognize text on the image with good quality. Doesn't use skew correction and areas detection. Works in fast mode.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.AsposeOcr.RecognizeImage(System.String)
member.summary: Recognizes text on image.
member.remarks: Uses automatic image skew correction and text areas detection. Supports GIF, PNG, JPEG, BMP, TIFF.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.AsposeOcr.RecognizeImage(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Recognizes text on image.
member.remarks: Recognizes image with ability to disable automatic text areas detection and image skew correction. Supports GIF, PNG, JPEG, BMP, TIFF.
member.param: Enable automatic text areas detection. If false, image is processed as single text block.
Enable automatic image skew correction. Enabled by default.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.AsposeOcr.RecognizeImage(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{Aspose.Drawing.Rectangle})
member.summary: Recognizes text on image.
member.remarks: Recognizes image with ability to specify text areas. Supports GIF, PNG, JPEG, BMP, TIFF. Automatic image skew correction is not applied.
member.returns: List of recognized text strings (one string for each specified text area).

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.AsposeOcr.RecognizeImage(System.String,Aspose.OCR.RecognitionSettings)
member.summary: Recognizes text on image.
member.remarks: Recognizes image with the ability to specify . Supports GIF, PNG, JPEG, BMP, TIFF.
member.returns: The object with image recognition results.

member.summary: Recognizes text on image.
member.remarks: Recognizes image with the ability to specify . Supports GIF, PNG, JPEG, BMP, TIFF.
member.returns: The object with image recognition results.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.AsposeOcr.PreprocessImage(System.IO.MemoryStream,Aspose.OCR.Models.PreprocessingFilters.PreprocessingFilter)
member.summary: Use image preprocessing to improve the accuracy of OCR. Create a list of filters that will be applied to the input image in the order you specify. example to create filters: PreprocessingFilter filters = new PreprocessingFilter { PreprocessingFilter.Invert(), PreprocessingFilter.Threshold(150), PreprocessingFilter.Binarize(), PreprocessingFilter.Rotate(180), PreprocessingFilter.Resize(3000,3000, Aspose.OCR.Filters.InterpolationFilterType.Box), PreprocessingFilter.Scale(6f), PreprocessingFilter.Dilate() }; You don't need all of them. Set only what you need.
member.returns: Stream with modified image so you can save or recognize it.

member.summary: Recognizes text on image.
member.remarks: Recognizes image with the ability to specify . Supports row decoded byte data.
member.param: Decoded image in bytes array. Uses RGB lighting technology for bitsPerPixel > 1.
member.returns: The object with image recognition results.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.AsposeOcr.RecognizeImageFromUri(System.String)
member.summary: Recognizes text on image provided by URI link.
member.remarks: Uses automatic image skew correction and text areas detection. Supports GIF, PNG, JPEG, BMP, TIFF.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.AsposeOcr.RecognizeImageFromUri(System.String,Aspose.OCR.RecognitionSettings)
member.summary: Recognizes text on image provided by URI link.
member.remarks: Recognizes image with the ability to specify . Supports GIF, PNG, JPEG, BMP, TIFF.
member.returns: The object with image recognition results.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.AsposeOcr.RecognizeMultipleImages(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},Aspose.OCR.RecognitionSettings)
member.summary:
Recognizes multiple images from list.
Archives and folders are not supported. Max amount of processed images is 20. Supports GIF, PNG, JPEG, BMP, TIFF.
member.returns: Array of objects with recognition results for each processed image.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.AsposeOcr.RecognizeMultipleImages(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary:
Recognizes multiple images from list with default settings.
Archives and folders are not supported. Max amount of processed images is 20. Supports GIF, PNG, JPEG, BMP, TIFF.
member.returns: Array of objects with recognition results for each processed image.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.AsposeOcr.RecognizeMultipleImages(System.String,Aspose.OCR.RecognitionSettings)
member.summary:
Recognizes multiple images packed in ZIP archive or from folder.
Nested archives and folders are not supported. Max amount of processed images is 20. Supports GIF, PNG, JPEG, BMP, TIFF.
member.param: Full path to the zip archive (including .zip extension) or to the folder with images.
member.returns: Array of objects with recognition results for each processed image.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.AsposeOcr.RecognizeMultipleImages(System.String)
member.summary:
Recognizes multiple images packed in ZIP archive or from folder with default settings.
Nested archives and folders are not supported. Max amount of processed images is 20. Supports GIF, PNG, JPEG, BMP, TIFF.
member.param: Full path to the zip archive (including .zip extension) or to the folder with images.
member.returns: Array of objects with recognition results for each processed image.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.AsposeOcr.RecognizeLine(System.String)
member.summary:
Recognizes image that contains single line of text.
Automatic image skew correction is not applied. Supports GIF, PNG, JPEG, BMP, TIFF.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.AsposeOcr.RecognizeLine(System.IO.MemoryStream)
member.summary:
Recognizes image that contains single line of text.
Automatic image skew correction is not applied. Supports GIF, PNG, JPEG, BMP, TIFF.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.AsposeOcr.GetRectangles(System.String,Aspose.OCR.AreasType,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Detects text areas on image.
Automatic image skew correction is not applied. Support GIF, PNG, JPEG, BMP, TIFF.
member.param: Determinates wich rectangles to return - line or paragraphs.
member.returns: List of detected text areas or lines.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.AsposeOcr.GetRectangles(System.IO.MemoryStream,Aspose.OCR.AreasType,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Detects text areas on image.
Automatic image skew correction is not applied. Support GIF, PNG, JPEG, BMP, TIFF.
member.param: Determinates wich rectangles to return - line or paragraphs.
member.returns: List of detected text areas or lines.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.AsposeOcr.CorrectSpelling(System.String,Aspose.OCR.SpellChecker.SpellCheckLanguage,System.String)
member.summary: Corrects text (replaces misspelled words).
member.param: Optionally. Full path to the user dictionary (frequency dictionary). Dictionary file format: Plain text file in UTF-8 encoding. Word and Word Frequency are separated by space or tab.Per default, the word is expected in the first column and the frequency in the second column. Every word-frequency-pair in a separate line.A line is defined as a sequence of characters followed by a line feed ("\n"), a carriage return ("\r"), or a carriage return immediately followed by a line feed("\r\n"). Every word is expected to be in lower case.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.AsposeOcr.SaveMultipageDocument(System.String,Aspose.OCR.SaveFormat,System.Collections.Generic.List{Aspose.OCR.RecognitionResult})
member.summary: Allows to get multipage document from list of RecognitionResult objects
member.param: Filename with a path for saving recognition result in the selected format.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.AsposeOcr.SaveMultipageDocument(System.IO.MemoryStream,Aspose.OCR.SaveFormat,System.Collections.Generic.List{Aspose.OCR.RecognitionResult})
member.summary: Allows to get multipage document from list of RecognitionResult objects
member.param: MemoryStream for saving recognition result in the selected format.

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.Filters.InterpolationFilterType
member.summary: Interpolations, used for scale images.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.Filters.InterpolationFilterType.Box
member.summary: The 'Box' Or 'Nearest Neighbor' filterю http://www.imagemagick.org/Usage/filter/#box

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.Filters.InterpolationFilterType.Triangle
member.summary: The 'Triangle' or 'Bilinear' interpolation filter just takes the interpolation of the nearest neighbourhood one step further. http://www.imagemagick.org/Usage/filter/#triangle

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.Filters.InterpolationFilterType.Hermite
member.summary: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hermite_interpolation

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.Filters.InterpolationFilterType.Bell
member.summary: http://www.imagemagick.org/Usage/filter/#gaussian

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.Filters.InterpolationFilterType.CubicBSpline
member.summary: http://www.imagemagick.org/Usage/filter/#cubics

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.Filters.InterpolationFilterType.Lanczos3
member.summary: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lanczos_resampling

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.Filters.InterpolationFilterType.Mitchell
member.summary: http://www.imagemagick.org/Usage/filter/#mitchell

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.Filters.InterpolationFilterType.Cosine
member.summary: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trigonometric_interpolation

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.Filters.InterpolationFilterType.CatmullRom
member.summary: The 'Catrom' (Catmull-Rom) filter is a well known standard Cubic Filter often used as a interpolation function. http://www.imagemagick.org/Usage/filter/#catrom-c

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.Filters.InterpolationFilterType.Quadratic
member.summary: http://www.imagemagick.org/Usage/filter/#quadratic

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.Filters.InterpolationFilterType.QuadraticBSpline
member.summary: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spline_interpolation

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.Filters.InterpolationFilterType.CubicConvolution
member.summary: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Directional_Cubic_Convolution_Interpolation

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.Filters.InterpolationFilterType.Lanczos8
member.summary: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lanczos_resampling

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.Metered
member.summary: Provides methods to set metered key.
member.example:
In this example, an attempt will be made to set metered public and private key
[C#]
Metered matered = new Metered(); matered.SetMeteredKey("PublicKey", "PrivateKey");
[Visual Basic]
Dim matered As Metered = New Metered matered.SetMeteredKey("PublicKey", "PrivateKey")

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.Metered.SetMeteredKey(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets metered public and private key

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.Metered.GetConsumptionQuantity
member.summary: Gets consumption file size

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.Metered.GetConsumptionCredit
member.summary: Gets consumption credit

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.License
member.summary: Provides methods to license the component.
member.example:
In this example, an attempt will be made to find a license file named MyLicense.lic in the folder that contains
the component, in the folder that contains the calling assembly, in the folder of the entry assembly and then in the embedded resources of the calling assembly.
[C#]
License license = new License(); license.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic");

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.License.SetLicense(System.String)
member.summary: Licenses the component.

remarks.p: Tries to find the license in the following locations:
2. The folder that contains the Aspose component assembly.
3. The folder that contains the client's calling assembly.
4. The folder that contains the entry (startup) assembly.
5. An embedded resource in the client's calling assembly.
Note:On the .NET Compact Framework, tries to find the license only in these locations:
2. An embedded resource in the client's calling assembly.

member.example:
In this example, an attempt will be made to find a license file named MyLicense.lic in the folder that contains
the component, in the folder that contains the calling assembly, in the folder of the entry assembly and then in the embedded resources of the calling assembly.
[C#]
License license = new License(); license.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic"); Can be a full or short file name or name of an embedded resource. Use an empty string to switch to evaluation mode.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.License.IsLicensed
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether product is licensed.
member.value: true if product is licensed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.License.SetLicense(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Licenses the component.
member.param: A stream that contains the license.

remarks.p: Use this method to load a license from a stream.

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.AreasType
member.summary: Determines the type of regions detected by the model.
member.remarks: Used in the to indicate which result will be obtained - paragraph coordinates or line coordinates.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.AreasType.PARAGRAPHS
member.summary: Sets regions as paragraphs

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.AreasType.LINES
member.summary: Sets regions as lines

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.AreasType.WORDS
member.summary: Sets regions as words

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.CharactersAllowedType
member.summary: Determines the type of characters allowed for recognition result.
member.remarks: Used in the to indicate which characters will be recognized.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.CharactersAllowedType.ALL
member.summary: Recognize all characters.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.CharactersAllowedType.LATIN_ALPHABET
member.summary: Recognize only if character is an latin alphabetic letter.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.CharactersAllowedType.DIGITS
member.summary: Recognize only if character is hexadecimal digit.

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.Models.PreprocessingFilters.PreprocessingFilter
member.summary: Base class for image processing commands.
Base class for image processing commands.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.Models.PreprocessingFilters.PreprocessingFilter.Binarize
member.summary: Converts an image to black-and-white image. Binary images are images whose pixels have only two possible intensity values. They are normally displayed as black and white. Numerically, the two values are often 0 for black, and 255 for white. Binary images are produced by auto thresholding an image.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.Models.PreprocessingFilters.PreprocessingFilter.Resize(System.Int32,System.Int32,Aspose.OCR.Filters.InterpolationFilterType)
member.summary: Rescale image - Upscale or downscale image resolution.
member.param: The new width of the image.
The new height of the image.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.Models.PreprocessingFilters.PreprocessingFilter.Resize(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Rescale image - Upscale or downscale image resolution. InterpolationFilterType = Lanczos8
member.param: The new width of the image.
The new height of the image.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.Models.PreprocessingFilters.PreprocessingFilter.Dilate
member.summary: Dilation adds pixels to the boundaries of objects in an image.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.Models.PreprocessingFilters.PreprocessingFilter.Invert
member.summary: Automatically inverts colors in a document image.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.Models.PreprocessingFilters.PreprocessingFilter.Rotate(System.Single)
member.summary: Rotate original image.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.Models.PreprocessingFilters.PreprocessingFilter.Scale(System.Single)
member.summary: Rescale image - Upscale or downscale image resolution. InterpolationFilterType = Lanczos8
member.param: The scaling factor. Recommended from 0.1 to 1 to shrink. From 1 to 10 to enlarge.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.Models.PreprocessingFilters.PreprocessingFilter.Scale(System.Single,Aspose.OCR.Filters.InterpolationFilterType)
member.summary: Rescale image - Upscale or downscale image resolution.
member.param: The scaling factor. Recommended from 0.1 to 1 to shrink. From 1 to 10 to enlarge.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.Models.PreprocessingFilters.PreprocessingFilter.ToGrayscale
member.summary: Converts an image to grayscale image. Grayscale image have 256 level of light in image (0 to 255).

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.Models.PreprocessingFilters.PreprocessingFilter.Threshold(System.Int32)
member.summary: Create a binary image based on setting a threshold value on the pixel intensity of the original image.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.Models.PreprocessingFilters.PreprocessingFilter.Median
member.summary: The median filter run through each element of the image and replace each pixel with the median of its neighboring pixels.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.Models.PreprocessingFilters.PreprocessingFilter.AutoDenoising
member.summary: Enables the use of an additional neural network to improve the image - reduce noise. Useful for images with scan artifacts, distortion, spots, flares, gradients, foreign elements.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.Models.PreprocessingFilters.PreprocessingFilter.AutoSkew
member.summary: Enables the automatic image skew correction.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.Models.PreprocessingFilters.PreprocessingFilter.ContrastCorrectionFilter
member.summary: Contrast correction filter.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.Models.PreprocessingFilters.PreprocessingFilter.GetEnumerator
member.summary: For IEnumarable interface realization.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.Models.PreprocessingFilters.PreprocessingFilter.Add(Aspose.OCR.Models.PreprocessingFilters.PreprocessingFilter)
member.summary: Add the new filter to the collection to further run all operations. Consistency in the collection matters.
member.param: New operation to add to filter list.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.Models.PreprocessingFilters.PreprocessingFilter.Binarize(Aspose.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Converts a part of the image to black-and-white image. Binary images are images whose pixels have only two possible intensity values. They are normally displayed as black and white. Numerically, the two values are often 0 for black, and 255 for white. Binary images are produced by auto thresholding an image.
member.param: Coordinates of the part of the image to be corrected.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.Models.PreprocessingFilters.PreprocessingFilter.Dilate(Aspose.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Dilation adds pixels to the boundaries of objects in a part of the image.
member.param: Coordinates of the part of the image to be corrected.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.Models.PreprocessingFilters.PreprocessingFilter.Invert(Aspose.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Automatically inverts colors in a part of the image.
member.param: Coordinates of the part of the image to be corrected.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.Models.PreprocessingFilters.PreprocessingFilter.Rotate(System.Single,Aspose.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Rotate a part of the image.
member.param: Coordinates of the part of the image to be corrected.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.Models.PreprocessingFilters.PreprocessingFilter.Threshold(System.Int32,Aspose.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Create a binary part of the image based on setting a threshold value on the pixel intensity of the original image part.
member.param: Coordinates of the part of the image to be corrected.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.Models.PreprocessingFilters.PreprocessingFilter.Median(Aspose.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: The median filter run through each element of the image part and replace each pixel with the median of its neighboring pixels.
member.param: Coordinates of the part of the image to be corrected.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.Models.PreprocessingFilters.PreprocessingFilter.AutoDenoising(Aspose.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Enables the use of an additional neural network to improve the image part - reduce noise. Useful for images with scan artifacts, distortion, spots, flares, gradients, foreign elements.
member.param: Coordinates of the part of the image to be corrected.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.Models.PreprocessingFilters.PreprocessingFilter.AutoSkew(Aspose.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Enables the automatic image part skew correction.
member.param: Coordinates of the part of the image to be corrected.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.Models.PreprocessingFilters.PreprocessingFilter.ContrastCorrectionFilter(Aspose.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Contrast correction filter for the part of the image.
member.param: Coordinates of the part of the image to be corrected.

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.DetectAreasMode
member.summary: Determines the type of neural network used for areas detection.
member.remarks: Used in the to specify which type of image you want to recognize.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.DetectAreasMode.NONE
member.summary: Doesn't detect paragraphs. Better for a simple one-column document without pictures.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.DetectAreasMode.DOCUMENT
member.summary: Detects paragraphs uses NN model for documents. Better for multicolumn document, document with pictures or with other not text objects.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.DetectAreasMode.PHOTO
member.summary: Detects paragraphs uses NN model for photos. Better for image with a lot of pictures and other not text objects.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.DetectAreasMode.COMBINE
member.summary: Detects paragraphs with text and then uses other NN model to detect areas inside of paragraphs. Better for images with complex structure.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.DetectAreasMode.TABLE
member.summary: Detects cells with text. Preferable mode for images with table structure.

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.Language
member.summary: Languages used for OCR. ISO 639-2 Code

member.summary: Multi-language (latin alphabet) support

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.PixelType
member.summary: Determines the type of the pixel data for image recognition.
member.remarks: Used in the to set the sequences of bytes in the data array.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.PixelType.BYTE
member.summary: Sets type as 1 bit per pixel.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.PixelType.RGB
member.summary: Sets type as rgb.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.PixelType.RGBA
member.summary: Sets type as argb.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.PixelType.BGR
member.summary: Sets type as bgr.

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.RecognitionResult
member.summary: The results of the image recognition. Contains elements with recognition information and methods for result export.

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.RecognitionResult.LinesResult
member.summary: Recognized text from row with row coordinates.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.RecognitionResult.LinesResult.TextInLine
member.summary: Recognized text from row.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.RecognitionResult.LinesResult.Line
member.summary: Row coordinates.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.RecognitionResult.RecognitionLinesResult
member.summary: Gets a list of recognition results with a list of rows (Rectangles).

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.RecognitionResult.RecognitionAreasText
member.summary: Gets list recognition results of a list of areas (Rectangles).

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.RecognitionResult.RecognitionAreasRectangles
member.summary: Gets rectangles coordinates.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.RecognitionResult.RecognitionCharactersList
member.summary: A set of characters found by the recognition algorithm and arranged in descending order of probability.
member.remarks: The array of symbols with the maximum probability and alternatives.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.RecognitionResult.RecognitionText
member.summary: Gets recognition result in one string.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.RecognitionResult.GetSpellCheckCorrectedText(Aspose.OCR.SpellChecker.SpellCheckLanguage,System.String)
member.summary: Corrects text (replaces misspelled words).
member.param: Optionally. Full path to the user dictionary (frequency dictionary). Dictionary file format: Plain text file in UTF-8 encoding. Word and Word Frequency are separated by space or tab.Per default, the word is expected in the first column and the frequency in the second column. Every word-frequency-pair in a separate line.A line is defined as a sequence of characters followed by a line feed ("\n"), a carriage return ("\r"), or a carriage return immediately followed by a line feed("\r\n"). Every word is expected to be in lower case.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.RecognitionResult.GetSpellCheckErrorList(Aspose.OCR.SpellChecker.SpellCheckLanguage,System.String)
member.summary: Find the misspelled words with suggested spellings for a given input text.
member.param: Optionally. Full path to the user dictionary (frequency dictionary). Dictionary file format: Plain text file in UTF-8 encoding. Word and Word Frequency are separated by space or tab.Per default, the word is expected in the first column and the frequency in the second column. Every word-frequency-pair in a separate line.A line is defined as a sequence of characters followed by a line feed ("\n"), a carriage return ("\r"), or a carriage return immediately followed by a line feed("\r\n"). Every word is expected to be in lower case.
member.returns: A list of SpellCheckError object representing misspelled words with lists suggested correct spellings for the each misspelled word, and with the edit distance.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.RecognitionResult.Skew
member.summary: Gets skew angle.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.RecognitionResult.Warnings
member.summary: Gets list of the warning messages describing non-critical faults appeared during generation.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.RecognitionResult.GetJson(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Form JSON string with recognition results.
member.param: Determines whether json will be human readable.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.RecognitionResult.GetXml
member.summary: Form XML string with recognition results.
member.returns: Recognition results as a string XML serialized.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.RecognitionResult.Save(System.String,Aspose.OCR.SaveFormat,System.Boolean,Aspose.OCR.SpellChecker.SpellCheckLanguage,System.String)
member.summary: Saves the document as the plain text, PDF or Microsoft Word Document.
member.param: Filename with a path for saving recognition result in the selected format.
Set true to correct misspelled words in case you have such in your recognition result.
Optionally. Full path to the user dictionary in .txt format. Format is [word - space - frequence(number)]. Example: the 23135851162\nthat 3400031103\n

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.RecognitionResult.Save(System.IO.MemoryStream,Aspose.OCR.SaveFormat,System.Boolean,Aspose.OCR.SpellChecker.SpellCheckLanguage,System.String)
member.summary: Saves the document as the plain text, PDF or Microsoft Word Document.
member.param: MemoryStream for saving recognition result in the selected format.
Set true to correct misspelled words in case you have such in your recognition result.
Optionally. Full path to the user dictionary in .txt format. Format is [word - space - frequence(number)]. Example: the 23135851162\nthat 3400031103\n

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.RecognitionResult.op_Addition(Aspose.OCR.RecognitionResult,Aspose.OCR.RecognitionResult)
member.summary: To complete the full result from recognized fragments (lines).
member.param: The object to which the right operand will be added.

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.SaveFormat
member.summary: For recognition result saving

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.SaveFormat.Text
member.summary: Saves the document in the plain text format.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.SaveFormat.Docx
member.summary: Saves the document as an Office Open XML WordprocessingML Document (macro-free).

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.SaveFormat.Pdf
member.summary: Saves the document as a PDF (Adobe Portable Document) Document.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.SaveFormat.Xlsx
member.summary: Saves the document as an Excel ( 2007 and later) workbook Document.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.SaveFormat.Xml
member.summary: Saves the document as an XML file.

member.name: F:Aspose.OCR.SaveFormat.Json
member.summary: Saves the document as an JSON file.

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.BaseRecognitionSettings
member.summary: Settings for the image recognition. Contains elements that allow customizing the recognition process.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.BaseRecognitionSettings.#ctor(Aspose.OCR.Language,System.Boolean,System.Single,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with full set of properties.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.BaseRecognitionSettings.ThreadsCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number fo threads for processing. By default, 0 means that the image will be processed with the number of threads equal to your number of processors. ThreadsCount = 1 means that the image will be processed in the main thread.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.BaseRecognitionSettings.AutoSkew
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag indicating whether automatic image skew correction should be enabled. Enabled (true) by default.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.BaseRecognitionSettings.SkewAngle
member.summary:
Gets or sets angle in degrees for image rotation.
Setting this value will disable the property, so that auto skew correction is not applied. Zero by default.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.BaseRecognitionSettings.Language
member.summary:
Gets or sets the language used for OCR.
Determines the alphabet used during recognition. Multi-language by default.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.BaseRecognitionSettings.ThresholdValue
member.summary: Gets or sets custom threshold value for image binarization. Range from 1 to 255.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.BaseRecognitionSettings.IgnoredCharacters
member.summary: Sets blacklist for recognition symbols.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.BaseRecognitionSettings.LinesFiltration
member.summary: Allows to recognize text in the tables (regions surrounded lines).
member.value: false allows increase performance and don't detect tables and remove lines; otherwise true. The default is false.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.BaseRecognitionSettings.PreprocessingFilters
member.summary: Allows to prepare the image for OCR by adjusting pre-processing methods.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.BaseRecognitionSettings.AutoContrast
member.summary: Allows using an additional contrast correction algorithm for the image before recognition.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.BaseRecognitionSettings.AllowedCharacters
member.summary: Allowed characters set. Determines the type of characters allowed for recognition result.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.BaseRecognitionSettings.DetectAreasMode
member.summary: Allows to select the optimal mode for document type areas: document, photo, plain text, column, image.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.BaseRecognitionSettings.AutoDenoising
member.summary: Enables the use of an additional neural network to improve the image - reduce noise. Useful for images with scan artifacts, distortion, spots, flares, gradients, foreign elements.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.BaseRecognitionSettings.UpscaleSmallFont
member.summary: Allows you to use additional algorithms specifically for small font recognition. Useful for images with small size characters.

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.DocumentRecognitionSettings
member.summary: Settings for the pdf recognition. Contains elements that allow customizing the recognition process.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.DocumentRecognitionSettings.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with short set of properties.
member.param: Set the first page for recognition. 0 by default.
Set the number of pages for recognition multipage pdf file.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.DocumentRecognitionSettings.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,Aspose.OCR.Language,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with full set of properties.
member.param: Set the first page for recognition. 0 by default.
Set the number of pages for recognition multipage pdf file.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.DocumentRecognitionSettings.DetectAreas
member.summary:
Gets or sets a flag indicating whether automatic text areas detection should be enabled.
Enables Document Structure Recognition module. This takes more time and memory to process an image, but provides more accurate results on complex cases. Disable (set to false) for faster image processing or in case of images with simple structure.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.DocumentRecognitionSettings.StartPage
member.summary: Set the first page for recognition.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.DocumentRecognitionSettings.PagesNumber
member.summary: Set the number of pages for recognition multipage pdf file.

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.ReceiptRecognitionSettings
member.summary: Settings for the receipt recognition. Contains elements that allow customizing the recognition process.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.ReceiptRecognitionSettings.#ctor(Aspose.OCR.Language)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with full set of properties.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.ReceiptRecognitionSettings.ThreadsCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number fo threads for processing. By default, 0 means that the image will be processed with the number of threads equal to your number of processors. ThreadsCount = 1 means that the image will be processed in the main thread.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.ReceiptRecognitionSettings.AutoSkew
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag indicating whether automatic image skew correction should be enabled. Enabled (true) by default.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.ReceiptRecognitionSettings.Language
member.summary:
Gets or sets the language used for OCR.
Determines the alphabet used during recognition. Multi-language by default.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.ReceiptRecognitionSettings.IgnoredCharacters
member.summary: Sets blacklist for recognition symbols.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.ReceiptRecognitionSettings.PreprocessingFilters
member.summary: Allows to prepare the image for OCR by adjusting pre-processing methods.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.ReceiptRecognitionSettings.AllowedCharacters
member.summary: Allowed characters set. Determines the type of characters allowed for recognition result.

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.RecognitionSettings
member.summary: Settings for the image recognition. Contains elements that allow customizing the recognition process.

member.name: M:Aspose.OCR.RecognitionSettings.#ctor(Aspose.OCR.Language,System.Collections.Generic.List{Aspose.Drawing.Rectangle},System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Single,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with full set of properties.
member.param: Manually set areas for recognition. Null by default - means whole image is processed.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.RecognitionSettings.RecognitionAreas
member.summary:
Gets or sets the list of text areas for processing.
Allows to manually specify the areas with text for more accurate recognition. If custom areas are set and properties will be ignored.
Disables DetectAreas and AutoSkew.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.RecognitionSettings.DetectAreas
member.summary:
Gets or sets a flag indicating whether automatic text areas detection should be enabled.
Enables Document Structure Recognition module. This takes more time and memory to process an image, but provides more accurate results on complex cases. Disable (set to false) for faster image processing or in case of images with simple structure.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.RecognitionSettings.RecognizeSingleLine
member.summary: Sets single-line image recognition. Disabled (false) by default. Disable all the processing steps associated with splitting into lines. Set this parameter to true if your image contains only one line. Disables RecognitionAreas settings, so all areas settings will be ignored.

member.name: T:Aspose.OCR.SpellChecker.SpellCheckError
member.summary: Representing misspelled word with additional data.

member.name: P:Aspose.OCR.SpellChecker.SuggestedWord.Distance
member.summary: The distance between the searched and suggestion.
